title: 2014 Ford Explorer Interceptor
item_description:
German Motors (Dealer Number: 07391)

Inspection: Monday, Wednesday-Friday, during business hours, 9:00 am to 4:00 pm. Please call (530) 661-0490 ext 204 to schedule.

Address: 1455 E Kentucky Ave, Woodland, CA 95776

2014 Ford Explorer Interceptor

Notes:

  • Vehicles may have holes where equipment has been removed
  • This agency does not provide smog certification or emissions retrofit. All smog-related repairs and certifications for vehicles are the sole responsibility of the buyer as outlined in California Vehicle Code, Division 12, Section 24007.5.
  • (Seller) makes no warranty, guaranty, or representation of any kind, expressed or implied. Sold 'as-is' and 'where-is' with no warranties expressed or implied. No claims of any kind shall be allowed after the item has been removed by the Buyer or the item has been signed for after the time of removal.
